name: Fall From Grace (Corentin Benoit-Gonin)
description:
Fall from Grace is a puzzle platformer. You control Grace, an adventurous lady that is stuck in a giant and peculiar hourglass. You need to find the exit by using the strange properties of the time down here, and also by using the sand falling from the top. But beware, the hourglass turns upside down now and then!

Use the SPACEBAR to jump, the ARROW KEYS to move and RETURN to pause the game.

Fall from Grace has been created during the 47th edition of Ludum Dare under 72 hours. Please, don't hesitate to rate our game on the Ludum Dare website! It helps a lot!

Corentin Benoit-Gonin: Code / Game design / Level design / SFX:

Amédée Fleau: Code / Game design

Sedeto: Illustrations / Sprite animation  / Logo /  BGM

Flora Sanchez: Textures 

Thanks a lot to Kenney for the font Kenney Pixel (please, go visit their website, it's amazing!)
